origin: Old English denn, of Germanic origin; related to German Tenne ‘threshing floor’, also to dene1.

definitions.definition: a wild mammal's hidden home; a lair.
definitions.example: a female mink had set up her den there

definitions.definition: a small subdivision of a Cub Scout pack.
(of a wild animal) live in a den.
definitions.example: the cubs denned in the late autumn
